author: Traci
text: I did get 2 of my orders the 3rd one I haven't received.  The live chat is not helping me besides saying yo wait . But the status of the sneakers says it was refunded to card that doesn't work anymore. And I would like money refunded to my new card but I can't speak to anyone. They need a phone number and this is unfair to not speak to anyone.
title: I did get 2 of my orders the 3rd one I…

author: Gev Petrosyan
text: I didn't receive the order. There isn't a way to contact customer support in a good way. The only way is an email that ends up with templated answers. The UPS confirmed the package loss, but StockX doesn't want to file a claim and refund.
title: I didn't receive the order

author: Kathy
text: Would not recommend using StockX to anyone. Placed an order seller did not follow through so was reordered and still did not receive. No updates on anything! I had to contact to see what was going on!
title: Would not recommend using StockX to…

author: Misty McFarland
text: I ordered my son orange yeezy slides in a 14 . I’m telling you … what came was a awful joke . 2 fakes that were so obvious that a 52 year old housewife could see it ! The shoes both marked a 14 were drastically different lengths ?!?! I told my son to notify you and he decided to tweet and he was offered $13.95 off his next order ! It’s beyond ridiculous. We have the hassle of returning them . I’m going to pay my assistant $20 to go bring them to scan and ship . We trusted your authenticity promise on a over $400 purchase . What are you doing ????
title: You clearly do not properly use your authentication

author: Cleo
text: The crocs I ordered were considered “new” but came without the jibbitz included in the purchase and pictured on the site.
title: The crocs I ordered were considered…

text: Slow shipping
title: Slow shipping

author: apostoleion2
text: Vary slow shipment and the item is arrived with a lot of esthetic demage, I bought a 25th anniversary Pikachu TCG and the item is arrived with the external part with a lot of demage... I m a collection is and and I payed for a good and new item but is not arrived like that.. I already contacted the assistance
title: Vary slow shipment and the item is…

author: Garrett
text: Purchased 3 pairs of Jordans from StockX and things went great. They all passed the authentication and were sent out in a timely manner but now that I bought a 3090 Ti, they haven't kept me up to date on that purchase. For the past 48 hours it's been sitting on "Awaiting Item to be picked up by carrier." That's way too long of a time period for there to be no communication with such an expensive item. I'm hoping it all works out but I wouldn't recommend anyone else to make large purchases with them as the communication is not consistent.
title: Small purchases okay but big purchases beware

author: Justine
text: I ordered what I believed would be an authentic designer bag, but was very disappointed in the item. I don't believe it is authentic and contacted stockx with my concerns. They said they had their internal authentication team review my photos and address the issue and state that the bag is authentic. I strongly disagree with their determination! I asked for additional information,but my request has not been fulfilled.
title: I ordered what I believed would be an…
